bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description: CID 1034478 Division or modulo by zero code: gst/tensor_converter/tensor_converter.c function: gst_tensor_converter_chain()

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/619>#619</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
added condition to check frame size for octet-stream (PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/622>#622</denchmark-link> )
Now this issue has been fixed. (10/10, 18:25 KST)
